record.name: Netcaster Spider
record.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

record.name: Hypothesizzle
record.text: Draw two cards. Then you may discard a nonland card. When you do, Hypothesizzle deals 4 damage to target creature.

record.name: Hero of Precinct One
record.text: Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
